page.title: 19TOURISM.HOLT.WORCS.
page.content: Tourism is catered for by a caravan and camping site at Holt Fleet on the east river meadows where both private and hired caravans are parked. The hotels, public houses, take-away food shops and cafes depend upon these tourists who arrive mainly from the Birmingham area during the summer months.Pleasure boats both private and chartered can be seen on the river, some en route from Stourport,Worcester and Gloucester. The R.Severn is themain attraction for tourists while the area is a good centre for Wales, the Malverns, the Cotswolds and Stratford-on-Avon.
